description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Fire

Standard

Reach 4

+33 vs AC; 2d8+9 damage plus 2d8 fire damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+33 vs AC; 2d8+9 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks or one bite attack, and then shifts 2 squares.

Immediate Reaction

Targets the triggering enemy

Trigger: When an enemy enters or leaves an adjacent square,

+31 vs Fortitude; 2d10+9 damage, the target is knocked prone, and the dragon shifts 2 squares.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Fire

Standard

Close blast 7

+31 vs Reflex; 5d10+9 fire damage, and the target is knocked prone. Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it. If the dragon is flying, it can shift 12 squares before making this attack

At-Will âœ¦ Fire

Standard

Ranged 20

+31 vs Reflex; 3d8+9 fire damage. Effect: Each creature adjacent to the target takes 3d8 fire damage.

Recharge 6

The dragon flies up to 12 squares and creates a wall of fire 1 square high on the ground directly beneath its path; area wall 12 within 10 (only in squares the dragon flew over); any creature that starts its turn in the wall's space or moves into it takes 25 fire damage. The wall lasts until the end of the dragon's next turn

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +31 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Encounter âœ¦ Fire

Free, After Using Breath Weapon Or Fire Stream

Any creature hit by the triggering attack also takes ongoing 15 fire damage and is dazed (save ends both).
